text:
Is this a brand new biz with no prior marketing efforts? 

If no, then I would evaluate what marketing was done previously + the spend.

If yes, then start with a plan/strategy and that will inform your budget for the quarter/half/year. 

Don’t forget to include marketing employees, SaaS, as well as potential freelancers/contractors (esp if you’re new you prob don’t have a huge team set up and will need help). Not sure if you’re doing a whole P&L but needs to be included. 

PS in my experience, if budgets were not spent during the fiscal then they were decreased the following fiscal instead. So you may want to keep that in mind ;)
